name: CyberDisk
description:
A Turn-Based Strategy game.


Spawn disks in your own area and fling them around the map. The aim is to reduce the enemy's health to 0, through the 3 scoring areas.

Currently 8 different types of disks.

See in game tutorial for more help.



Thank you for checking the game's page and if you do choose to download the game i hope you have fun with it. If you have any feedback or problems, please feel free to add a comment to the bottom of the page.

Mouse - Position disks

Left Mouse Button - Place or select piece

Q - Left spin

E - Right spin

1 - 4 - Select cards currently in hand

All assets are my own except:

Music/Sound effects: Erokia - www.freesound.org/people/Erokia/

Effects: Infinity Blade: Effects - www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/infinity-blade-ef...
